name: part_002
file: tmp_【#REBIRTH3D】Kureiji Ollie's 3D Birthday LIVE 2024 - REBIRTH, The True Me【hololive Indonesia】 [O607BZ8HwDk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the performance of 'Say It.' (Gitte) by Kureiji Ollie, Vestia Zeta, and Ayunda Risu.
A story/MC section where Risu and Zeta thank Ollie for helping backstage and discuss why she became a zombie.
Performance of 'Otona Blue' by Moona Hoshinova, Kureiji Ollie, Kaela Kovalskia, and Kobo Kanaeru.

subtitles.original: きっと人生最後の日、お前を想うのだろう。
subtitles.english: I'll surely think of you on the very last day of my life.

subtitles.original: 全部全部言い足りなくて惜しいけど。
subtitles.english: It's a shame that I haven't said it all.

subtitles.original: ああ、いつか人生最後の日、君がいないことを。
subtitles.english: Ah, that one day, on the last day of my life, you won't be here.

subtitles.original: もっと もっと もっと...
subtitles.english: More, more, more...

subtitles.original: もっとちゃんと、言って。
subtitles.english: Say it properly.

subtitles.original: あのね、空が青いのってどうやって伝えればいいんだろうね。
subtitles.english: You know, how should I describe that the sky is blue?

subtitles.original: 夜の雲が高いのってどうすれば君もわかるんだろう。
subtitles.english: How do I make you understand that the night clouds are high?

subtitles.original: 言って。
subtitles.english: Say it.

subtitles.original: あのね、私、実はわかっているの。もう君が行ったこと。
subtitles.english: You know, I actually know... that you've already gone.

subtitles.original: あのね、わからずやって言うんだろうね。忘れたいんだけど。
subtitles.english: You know, you'd call it being stubborn. I want to forget, though.

subtitles.original: もっとちゃんと言ってよ。忘れないようメモにしてよ。
subtitles.english: Tell me more properly. Write a note so I won't forget.

subtitles.original: 明日十時にホームで待ち合わせとかしよう。
subtitles.english: Let's meet at the platform at 10:00 AM tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 牡丹は散っても花だ。夏が去っても追憶は切な。
subtitles.english: Peonies are still flowers even when they fall. Even after summer passes, memories are painful.

subtitles.original: 口に出して。
subtitles.english: Say it out loud.

subtitles.original: 声に出して。
subtitles.english: Say it with your voice.

subtitles.original: 君が言って。
subtitles.english: You say it.

subtitles.original: そして人生最後の日、君が見えるのなら。
subtitles.english: And on the last day of my life, if I can see you...

subtitles.original: きっと人生最後の日も愛を歌うのだろう。
subtitles.english: I'll surely sing about love on the last day of my life too.

subtitles.original: 全部全部無駄じゃなかったって言うから。
subtitles.english: Because I'll say that none of it was in vain.

subtitles.original: ああ、いつか人生最後の日、君がいないことがまだ信じられないけど。
subtitles.english: Ah, that one day, on the last day of my life, I still won't believe you're gone.

subtitles.original: もっと もっと もっと もっと...
subtitles.english: More, more, more, more...

subtitles.original: もっと もっと もっと もっと...
subtitles.english: More, more, more, more...

subtitles.original: ちゃんと言って。
subtitles.english: Say it properly.

subtitles.original: Makasih udah bantuin kita bersihin panggung ya Ollie!
subtitles.english: Thanks for helping us set up the stage Ollie!

subtitles.original: Iya! Tadi kabelnya kusut semua, untung Senpai bantu benerin.
subtitles.english: Yeah! We kinda had troubles with the cables, good thing you helped us untangle them!

subtitles.original: Hehehe no problem. Malah aku yang seneng lho bisa ketemu sama kalian di sini.
subtitles.english: Hehe! No problem. If anything, I'm really happy I got to catch you guys here!

subtitles.original: Aku sedikit mau curhat soalnya.
subtitles.english: I actually have something in my head recently...

subtitles.original: Hm? Ada apa ada apa?
subtitles.english: Oh? What's up?

subtitles.original: Akhir-akhir ini aku lagi kepikiran, kenapa ya aku jadi zombie?
subtitles.english: Lately I've been wondering...

subtitles.original: Buat apa gitu lho.
subtitles.english: what the reason of my zombie becoming was.

subtitles.original: Kalau menurut kalian, aku kenapa jadi zombie?
subtitles.english: Why do you guys think I turned into a zombie?

subtitles.original: Ooh lagi cari jati diri ya?
subtitles.english: Oh you're searching for your identity.

subtitles.original: Hmm kalau menurut aku sih, kayaknya masih ada harapan dan hal-hal yang sebenarnya masih pengen kamu capai.
subtitles.english: Well, I think there are a lot hopes and things that you want to pursue.

subtitles.original: Harapan itu saking kuatnya sampai bikin kamu bangkit lagi jadi zombie.
subtitles.english: Because of your strong will and hope, you got reanimated and turned into a zombie.

subtitles.original: Ooooh bisa jadi!
subtitles.english: That sounds close!

subtitles.original: Kalau menurut Zeta?
subtitles.english: What do you think is the reason, Zeta?

subtitles.original: Kalau menurut aku sih, itu senpai sebenarnya masih pengen bikin memori lebih banyak lagi makanya hidup lagi. Tapi nggak tau deh.
subtitles.english: Hmm I think your body just wants to make more happy memories! Maybe!

subtitles.original: Hmm menarik! Makasih ya inputnya!
subtitles.english: I see! Thanks so much for the input guys!

subtitles.original: Mungkin itu jawabannya.
subtitles.english: I think those are pretty spot on reasons!

subtitles.original: Sama-sama. Moga-moga kamu dapat pencerahan ya!
subtitles.english: No problem! Hope you get to find your reason soon!

subtitles.original: Semangat Senpai!
subtitles.english: Good luck senpai!

subtitles.original: Makasih!
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: わかってる、ほしいんでしょ。
subtitles.english: I know, you want it, right?

subtitles.original: 艶やかなこの唇。
subtitles.english: These glossy lips.

subtitles.original: 柔な男たち惹きよせる、息を呑むほど。
subtitles.english: Luring in weak men, to the point they're breathless.
